feed.title: Comments on Cheers: Belongingness and Para-Social Relationships
feed.subtitle: In yesterday's All Things Considered, NPR commentator Jake Halpern questions why you feel like you have a relationship with the characters in your favorite TV shows. His answer: "That's because you do." This idea is interesting not just to help us understand how we relate to imaginary characters, but also to correlate with our own understanding of Dunbar Number relationship limits and how they might relate to this concept. (post continues)

link.title: How did the link to this blog get into the blog on server side browser. That blog does not even...

entry.summary: How did the link to this blog get into the blog on server side browser. That blog does not even...
entry.content:
How did the link to this blog get into the blog on server side browser. That blog does not even allow comments so that one can ask questions like that. That blog has given links to some 100 blogs that have nothing to do with server side browsing.

I hope I'd be in order if I enter a link to one such blog below.

http://www.newerawisp.blogspot.com

entry.title: Reb Yudel commented on 'Cheers: Belongingness and Para-Social Relationships'
